item.title: Help Button [PI NukeRune]
item.dc:creator: @noty noty
item.description:
@noty wrote:

Hello Guys, Could You Guys Please Tell Me How I Put In “Click Here To Teleport To This Player”? Like If I Click There Ill Automacly Teleport To This Player Thanks

NOTICE: THIS IS PI.

if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("help")) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { c.getPA().startTeleport(2008, 4755, 0, "modern"); if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; if(c2.playerRights == 1 && c2.playerRights == 2 || c2.playerRights == 3){ c.sendMessage("<shad=65280> Your Request Has Been Send To A Staff Member, He Will Help You Soon As Possible."); c2.sendMessage("<shad=16711680>" +c.playerName+ "</col> Is Requesting Your Assistance, "); } } }

Read full topic
